dct_title_s: The Lhasa map : traditional Tibetan architecture and townscape = Architektur und Stadtbild des traditionellen Tibet = Architecture et paysage urbain tibétains traditionnels / Gecko Maps. (Verso)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by form lines and spot heights. On verso: Greater Lhasa, c. 1985, scale 1: 60 000 --Marpori, scale 1:3,000 -- Lhasa Old Town, scale1:3,000 [ map shows protected and uprotectd buildings, new buildings, new buildings with old elements] -- -- Potala Palace, scale 2,000 -- Norbulingka, the "Jewel Park", scale 1:6,000 -- Jokhang temple, c 640, scale 1:1,500 -- Ramoche Temple, scale 1:7,500 -- Chakpori south, scale 1:3,000 -- Chakpori north, scale 1:3,000. Includes notes describing destroyed and protected buildings. Title from cover. Includes text, index to points of interest, and color illustrations.
